## Onion Encryption
Crypto - 125 points

Description
------------



Hint
------------
Make sure you cover all of your bases!

Internal Description
------------
This is layers of reversible encryption on top of each other.
Base 64 -> ACSII Codes (base 10) -> Base 64 -> Hexadecimal -> Flag (plaintext)
Easily solvable [here](http://www.d.umn.edu/~berna228/Convert.php)

Flag
------------
`flag{layered_l1ke_an_0ni0n}`
